name: Out Of Hand (The Gingerman, Kalbasador)
description:
this game was created for the 2020 GMTK game jam. the theme of the game jam was "out of control" which can also be interpreted as "out of hand". So we made a game where the player controls the clown's right hand as he tries to juggle several balls while the left hand throws the balls in a random direction, out of the player's control.

Credits:

Kalbasador - Art and programming

The GingerMan - Logo and Programming
